title: Russia Yukos trial shows weak rule of law

content.question: In Russia, the Yukos trial and the subsequent imprisonment of Mikhail Khodorkovsky reflected which of the following?

choices.label: The continued weakening of the rule of law in Russia
The growing influence of investigative journalism in Russia
The increased rights of citizens to sue in Russia
The continued manipulation of the legal system by Russian businesses
The limited rights of Chechen separatists

content.answer: The continued weakening of the rule of law in Russia

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
